contents:
Tired of forgetting the absolute gems of hilarious nonsense your friends, coworkers, or family blurt out? Look no further! This logbook is here to immortalize those epic moments of verbal chaos.
This laugh-out-loud journal is your ultimate tool for documenting every face-melting quote, accidental joke, and brain-fart blunder. With its fun scoring system, you’ll rank the best (or worst!) episodes and create a leaderboard of unforgettable moments. It’s also a great tool for team building and bonding, since we can be sure that all humans will human eventually.
Easy-to-Use Layout: Includes space for the when, who, reporter, context, episode, and a fun review and scoring board on each page Perfect for Sharing: Bring it to company review meetings, team parties, project workshops, or the breakroom for endless fun An Amazing Gift: Ideal for your boss, coworkers, teammates, friends, and family Don’t let hilarious moments disappear into thin air - turn them into memories you’ll never stop laughing about! Start building your score today!
title: Epic Fails Logbook: Scored Journal of All the Funny and Dumb Things We Can't Unsay or Undo

title: Wall of Shame: Scored Journal of All the Funny and Dumb Things We Can't Unsay or Undo

contents:
Today we published our first gag journal on Amazon. It’s a great sensation to accomplish the first milestone for our studio.
Now we’ll continue our work on many other titles and types of books. This is just the beginning, stay tuned for much more fun… :)
title: Intro

contents:
This file exists solely to respond to /search URL with the related search layout template.
No content shown here is rendered, all content is based in the template layouts/page/search.html
Setting a very low sitemap priority will tell search engines this is not important content.
This implementation uses Fusejs, jquery and mark.js
Initial setup Search depends on additional output content type of JSON in config.toml
[outputs] home = ["HTML", "JSON"] Searching additional fileds To search additional fields defined in front matter, you must add it in 2 places.
Edit layouts/_default/index.JSON This exposes the values in /index.json i.e. add category
... "contents":{{ .Content | plainify | jsonify }} {{ if .Params.tags }}, "tags":{{ .Params.tags | jsonify }}{{end}}, "categories" : {{ .Params.categories | jsonify }}, ... Edit fuse.js options to Search static/js/search.js
keys: [ "title", "contents", "tags", "categories" ]
title: Search Results
